CustomField.description: Users select this optional picklist field to specify the time in business if Business Start Date is missing. By default, it is empty.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to specify the time in business if Business Start Date is missing.
CustomField.label: Estimated Time in Business

value.fullName: Applicant has been in business less than two years
value.label: Applicant has been in business less than two years

value.fullName: Applicant has been in business two or more years
value.label: Applicant has been in business two or more years

value.fullName: Not provided by applicant and otherwise undetermined
value.label: Not provided by applicant and otherwise undetermined
